heroImage.alt: Find yourself the way to Blame Your Brother.

contact.title: Let's Chat.
contact.description:
We like to be where inspiration is readily available. It's why we've set up shop in the heart of Toronto's vibrant design district. It helps us stay connected to the creative community that's around every corner.

And with that in mind, we're always excited to meet new and like-minded individuals. So if you're close by, drop in for a coffee and a chat. It'll be cool.

heroImage.alt: A view of the office of Blame Your Brother.

about.title: Our Story.
about.description:
Blame Your Brother Creative Workshop is a boutique animation and design studio. Based in Toronto, Ontario, we specialize in 2D classical and 2D/3D digital animation along with developing intellectual property for commercial and broadcast clients.

Our goal is to create compelling and entertaining work by combining the power of design with a story-driven message. Since we're an artist-owned shop, we also bring a personal touch to every project that walks through our door.

Though we're a locally-based shop, we've been lucky to build contacts that have a global reach. They're contacts that have been developed through years of working in the animation and advertising communities.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: First thing's first. Yes, we're all friends. But friends that are in complete collaboration with each other. And though we have different skill sets – whether it's art direction, production or animation – we all believe in creating design and story-driven content. So we all push each other to do great work that's done with great care.

reel.title: Our Reel
reel.description: Sit back, relax, and enjoy the show!
